attributes.action: A full enquiry into the extent of Muslim grooming gangs & agency failings .
attributes.additional_details: A Full & Open enquiry, a fair & honest discussion about this very serious problem. Disciplinary action brought against any person who is found to have attempted in any way to cover up, down play or ignore these despicable & truly devastating crimes.
attributes.background: We would like a full & thorough investigation into the extent of the criminal activities of these grooming gangs, who the perpetrators are, including ethnicity & religion, which ethnicity they targeted & why the authorities failed to act on information sooner & who is responsible for those decisions

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
